decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1625/01, Unnumbered Site Location Plan, received on 03/10/2017;
1625/03A & 1625/04B, received on 28/11/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - The extension hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 137 Bedfont Close.
description: Erection of a single storey side extension to the house.
